bioAsHtml: Technical leader at Apside, Christophe tries to bring good practices in various projet and university in the middle of France. Converted to IT 12 years ago following a neurobiology PhD, he actively contributes in Java communities. He has been co-responsible for the Java part of the french community website developpez.com, but also founding and leading the Tours JUG since 2008 and speaking in various conferences and JUG.
